Job description

Uniqpol is a manufacturer of only the finest European-Style Deli Foods dedicated to exceptional quality, flavours and customer service. Our meats, jellies and specialty products can be found across Ontario through independent food service distributors. Over the past 20 years, we have perfected our products and are proud to serve the best quality foods possible.

We’re looking for a Office Assistant at Uniqpol in Brantford, who will join our friendly staff for a summer position and be responsible for working closely with customers, office manager, and other counterpersons.

Requirements & abilities.

  • Proven success in office coordination
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Strong time-management and multitasking abilities
  • Proficiency with office applications, and aptitude for learning new software and systems
  • Ability to maintain confidentiality of company information

Responsibilities

  • Handling incoming calls and other communications.
  • Managing filing system.
  • Recording information as needed.
  • Greeting clients and visitors as needed.
  • Updating paperwork, maintaining documents, and word processing.
  • Helping organize and maintain office common areas.
  • Performing general office clerk duties and errands
  • Creating, maintaining, and entering information into databases.

We offer:

  • In-store discount for our our deli products and shelf item
  • The opportunity to work full-time in the future
  • Great atmosphere in a rapidly-growing company

Salary:

21$/hour

Transportation:

Own transportation

Location:

Uniqpol Inc

21 Middleton St, Brantford, ON N3S 7X1

Job Posted: March 21st, 2023
